about_the_game:
Elon Simulator 2019 is a dynamic shooting game in the space. Feel as a Starman on it’s journey to the Mars!



Shoot the space objects to win or simply avoid them to staying alive for as long as you can. Different objects bumping into you would cause different levels of damages and - as you’ll soon find out - some of them are much more dangerous than others.

The game currently features:

  • Exciting gameplay
  • Variety of space objects
  • Dynamic soundtrack

And once you'll reach the Mars continue the journey with our next game

highlighted.name: You have left the Earth behind!
Welcome in Space! Put your contume on, bro, the air is so different here.
The space needs a weapon. Stronger, then you would use back at home..
That's right. There are meteorites here.. and they aren't that friendly, are they?
Your first great discovery! Just look at those amazing stars..
It's official now. You are in THE SPACE! Have a great trip there.
It is the biggest meteorite you've destroyed so far! Keep it on!
The starts are moving.. They are calling for you..
Your mission is almost complete, bro.. There is the Mars over there already!

detailed_description:
Elon Simulator 2019 is a dynamic shooting game in the space. Feel as a Starman on it’s journey to the Mars!



Shoot the space objects to win or simply avoid them to staying alive for as long as you can. Different objects bumping into you would cause different levels of damages and - as you’ll soon find out - some of them are much more dangerous than others.

The game currently features:

  • Exciting gameplay
  • Variety of space objects
  • Dynamic soundtrack

And once you'll reach the Mars continue the journey with our next game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or similar
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or similar
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

name: Elon Simulator 2019

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or similar
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: The year is 2019.. There is a loong way to the Mars.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
